mil3.7.6:0.3: Question on the Factors for Awakening
mil3.7.6:1.2: “Venerable Nāgasena, how many factors for awakening are there?”
mil3.7.6:1.3: “There are seven factors for awakening, your majesty.”
mil3.7.6:1.4: “By how many of these seven factors for awakening, venerable sir, does one awaken?”
mil3.7.6:1.5: “One awakens by one of these, your majesty, the awakening factor of discrimination of states.”
